questions.question: An investment bank's role in 'underwriting' involves:
options: Guaranteeing the sale of a new issue of securities
Writing letters of credit for small businesses
questions.correctAnswer: Guaranteeing the sale of a new issue of securities
questions.explanation: Underwriting is the process by which investment banks raise investment capital from investors on behalf of corporations and governments that are issuing securities.

questions.question: Which type of risk is most closely associated with the 'inability to convert assets into cash quickly without significant loss'?
questions.explanation: Liquidity risk occurs when an individual investor, business, or financial institution cannot meet its short-term debt obligations or sell an asset quickly for cash.

questions.question: Identify the modal of deduction indicating something is impossible: 'The company ___ be profitable; they have lost 50% of their clients this year.'
questions.explanation: 'Can't' is used for strong negative deduction (it is impossible).
